content: I-I'm truly sorry. I can't believe I forgot... {A笑眯眯}Please allow me to make up for it with a belated... <style=SizeBig>Happy Birthday!</style>
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-第一次对话-玩家生日第二天-1005幻雪_特殊反馈

content: My memory has been pretty reliable lately. {A心虚目移}Wait, yesterday was your birthday?!!!
